name: The Expellers
description:
Entry for the Spooktober Spooktacular Game Jam of Rpg Maker Forums

Simon, Ingrid and Belief are a group of exorcist called "The expellers", they work is protecting the humanity from the constant attacks of Entities, creatures who only want chaos and destruction.

The fight against entities is complicated, exist different types, each one with his strengths and weakness and for this reason each member of the expellers have traits to cover any confrontation.

Tips:

- In Key items you got a book that explain better about the different types of entities

- Simon deals physical/Fire damage, Ingrid Spiritual/Sacro and belief take advantage from different elemental damages, use this to identify what character can make good damage against an entity

- The team have a Sacred guardian, a mystic totem who provide aoe support abilities and you can add more, equipping decorations that you can buy in the weapon section

- Dont grind to much, the leveling is dangerous, because lower your stats instead of raising them
